config.title: Rental settings
config.description: Global settings for the rental plugin

general.title: General settings
general.showBadgeTooltip: Rental products in the listing are provided with a badge, similar to the „New“ badge
general.showRentalTermsTooltip: The customer needs to confirm the rental conditions in the order overview
general.uniformRentalPeriodsTooltip: If this option is active, customers can only select one rental period per order. If the rental period is changed for an item, all other rental items are also updated.

blockedDays.title: Block dates
blockedDays.removeBlockedDays: Subtract  blocked days from rental period
blockedDays.removeBlockedDaysTooltip: If this option is active, blocked days are subtracted from the total rental period
